title: What if Essence Reaver were to become the new Brutalizer item?
body:
This way the only path isn't {{item:3142}} and {{item:3508}} gets some more play. Think about it, this would benefit a lot of people, ranging from {{champion:126}} to {{champion:80}} and even some champions like {{champion:91}} or {{champion:56}} who could then spam abilities even more in lane, and now with armor pen.

The build get could changed to {{item:3134}} + A new Baby Soul Reaver Item (I believe the popular term for an item is "Soul Sickle") that gives 10 AD and a smaller amount of what Reaver does not. And maybe a {{item:1053}} so the Spell vamp doesn't seem out of place.

Price cost would be {{item:3134}} 1337 gold + {{item:1053}} 800 gold + [Soul Sickle] 800 gold(?) plus a combine cost of say, 263 gold to put it at 3200 gold, the current price, or perhaps more (after all, it would be giving armor pen now). And the stats would be 10% CDR, +10 Armor pen, (those are from Brutalizer), its current passive, 10% lifesteal, and 80 AD, which could perhaps be toned down to around 65 so it doesn't quite match the AD of {{item:1038}} items, although doing that I think the price should stay the same.

Thoughts?

replies.body: Brutalizer on Essense Reaver have a lot of sense specially by the 10% CD the AD can be down to 70. And the build path is better Brutalizer and Mini Reaver where Mini Reaver grants mana leech, AD and Life Steal.

Soul Sickle should not have lifesteal built into it, or it'll crowd out Bilgewater Cutlass. Soul Sickle should only have the AD and mana leech so that early on, you gotta make a choice: sustain, mana restore, or pure damage from BFS? You can't have them all 10 minutes in unless you're completely fed.

Actually my post is based on [this one](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/zpkbgYs4-giving-essence-reaver-an-identity) (and a comment that I wrote far before writing my post). I did not see this post until now that my stalker came to my post to harass me.
While the idea has merit, I am of the opinion that flat penetration causes more problems than it solves, and I'm hoping that this Black Cleaver change is the first step in phasing out flat pen.
I do however think "soul sickle" (a small essence reaver) would be a really really cool thing. I like soul sickle more than adding another armor pen item to the game.

Like Bami's Cinder Brutalizer now have 2 build paths but one of these two build paths is only avaible for junglers, so Brutalizer still relevant, but its true the Essense Reaver need to be the AD Caster item, and Brutalizer fit very well in that role, the Mini Reaver can be some kind of Tiamat, Arm Seeker, Hexdrinker etc. That only have one final build path. and personally its not a good idea have mid tier items that only have a final build path.

In all honesty, Essence Reaver needs to lose the lifesteal component altogether. Bloodthirster eclipses it in that regard, so ER needs to stop trying to compete with BT for sustain and instead focus on its niche: mana restoration for AD casters.
